name: CampTix TrustCard Payment Gateway
author: Webikon (Ján Bočínec)

sections.description:
TrustCard Payment Gateway for the CampTix plugin.

You can read more about TrustCard at trustpay.eu

This plugin is third-party stuff and it isn’t directly associated with Trust Pay, a.s. or officially supported by their developers.

Thanks the Slovak WordPress community and Webikon for the support. For more information about me check out my personal page.
sections.installation:
1. Upload camptix-trustpay to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Tickets -> Setup in your WordPress admin area to set the currency and activate the TrustCard gateway.
sections.changelog:

  • Tagging version 1.0.2

1.0.1

  • Added languages and currencies

1.0.0

  • First release
